channel.title: SF Opera BRAVO! CLUB Podcast
channel.itunes:author: BRAVO! CLUB
channel.description: Check out events from the San Francisco Opera BRAVO! CLUB. The BRAVO! CLUB is a group of young adults dedicated to building a new audience for the San Francisco Opera.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Podcast for the San Francisco Opera BRAVO! CLUB.
channel.itunes:summary: Check out events from the San Francisco Opera BRAVO! CLUB. The BRAVO! CLUB is a group of young adults dedicated to building a new audience for the San Francisco Opera.

item.title: BRAVO! CLUB Gala News Coverage
item.itunes:author: BRAVO! CLUB
item.description: Check out the hottest in fashion and entertainment at one of the top black tie events in the country, the 2009 San Francisco Opera Opening Night Gala (September 11, 2009). A veritable who's who of the West Coast, interviews include Former Secretary of State George Shultz, Former Mayor Willie Brown, Nicola Luisotti (SF Opera music director), Dimitri Hvorostovsky (baritone), Susan Graham (Mezzo Soprano), David Gockley (General Director), Melissa Boxer (Bravo! Club President), Alexandra Siliezar (Barvo! Gala co-chair), Marie Carr (Bravo! Gala co-chair). Interviews by John Houghton of MobileCast Media.
item.itunes:subtitle: Check out the hottest in fashion and entertainment at one of the top black tie events in the country.
item.itunes:summary: Check out the hottest in fashion and entertainment at one of the top black tie events in the country, the 2009 San Francisco Opera Opening Night Gala (September 11, 2009). A veritable who's who of the West Coast, interviews include Former Secretary of State George Shultz, Former Mayor Willie Brown, Nicola Luisotti (SF Opera music director), Dimitri Hvorostovsky (baritone), Susan Graham (Mezzo Soprano), David Gockley (General Director), Melissa Boxer (Bravo! Club President), Alexandra Siliezar (Barvo! Gala co-chair), Marie Carr (Bravo! Gala co-chair). Interviews by John Houghton of MobileCast Media.
item.itunes:keywords: San Francisco Opera Gala, style, fashion

item.title: International Opera Star Susan Graham in Conversation
item.itunes:author: BRAVO! CLUB
item.description: Grammy Award-winning international opera star Susan Graham is interviewed by David Gockley, San Francisco Opera general director, at the 2007 BRAVO! CLUB Luminary Dinner. Listen to this lively and insightful conversation as Susan discusses her upbringing in Texas, musical influences, early career at the Santa Fe Opera, subsequent graduation to bigger roles, and aspirations for future roles. Susan sings the title role in Ariodante in the San Francisco Opera 2008 Summer Season. Special thanks to MobileCast Media, www.mobilecastmedia.com for producing this podcast.
item.itunes:subtitle: Grammy Award-winning singer interviewed by David Gockley, San Francisco Opera general director
item.itunes:summary: Grammy Award-winning international opera star Susan Graham is interviewed by David Gockley, San Francisco Opera general director, at the 2007 BRAVO! CLUB Luminary Dinner. Susan sings the title role in Ariodante in the San Francisco Opera 2008 Summer Season. Special thanks to MobileCast Media, www.mobilecastmedia.com for producing this podcast.
item.itunes:keywords: Santa Fe Opera, pants roles, Houston Grand Opera

item.title: Sneak Peek: Preview of the 2007 - 2008 Season
item.itunes:author: BRAVO! CLUB
item.description: Be one of the first to learn what's in store for San Francisco Opera's exciting 2007 - 2008 Season and hear it directly from the source on this podcast. David Gockley speaks about his plans for the Season and his thoughts for the future of San Francisco Opera. Also hear from Ginny Cartwright-Ziegler about upcoming events for San Francisco Opera's BRAVO! CLUB. Special thanks to MobileCast Media for producing this podcast.
item.itunes:subtitle: Preview lecture of the 2007 - 2008 Opera Season
item.itunes:summary: Be one of the first to learn what's in store for San Francisco Opera's exciting 2007 - 2008 Season and hear it directly from the source on this podcast. item.itunes:keywords: samson and delilah, tannhauser, appomattox, the magic flute, la rondine

item.title: BRAVO! Fashion Event and Overview
item.itunes:author: BRAVO! CLUB Fashion Event
item.description: What are the new looks are this fall from Macy's flagship San Francisco store? Check it out and also learn about the San Francisco Opera BRAVO! CLUB, which is a young professional group dedicated to cultivating the next generation of opera patrons. This video podcast was produced by MobileCast Media, Inc, www.mobilecastmedia.com. Contact us for your podcasting needs at 800 508-8155.

item.itunes:keywords: Fashion, Dolce Gabbana, Fall, new look, clothing, Macy's

item.title: Opening Night Preview of A Masked Ball
item.itunes:author: BRAVO! CLUB
item.description: This is a must listen podcast before opening night! Dr. Clifford (Kip) Cranna of the San Francisco Opera is interviewed by John Houghton of the BRAVO! CLUB in a preview of A Masked Ball, by Giuseppe Verdi. In this podcast you can hear a discussion of the plot, the original story upon which the opera is based, casting and production, the literary form of tragedy, Venetian costume parties, and what to expect on opening night.
item.itunes:subtitle: Discussion of Verdi's Masked Ball
item.itunes:summary: This is a must listen podcast before opening night! Dr. Clifford (Kip) Cranna of the San Francisco Opera is interviewed by John Houghton of the BRAVO! CLUB in a preview of A Masked Ball, by Giuseppe Verdi. In this podcast you can hear a discussion of the plot, the original story upon which the opera is based, casting and production, the literary form of tragedy, Venetian costume parties, and what to expect on opening night.
item.itunes:keywords: Deborah Voight, tragedy, opening night, synopsis, Verdi

item.title: BRAVO! 101
item.itunes:author: BRAVO! CLUB
item.description: The BRAVO 101 presentation provides insight into the basics of Opera and we are delighted to have Sara Jobin featured in this podcast. In her musical career, Sara has worn many hats a the San Francisco Opera, conductor, assistant conductor and a variety of other roles. In this episode, Sara shares with us a behind-the-scenes look at what's involved in bringing an opera to life through the rehearsal and production process.
item.itunes:subtitle: Behind the scenes look at what's involved in bringing an opera to life through the rehearsal and production process.

item.itunes:keywords: opera, rehearsal, tenor, soprano, bass, mezo, conductor, aria, Puccini, Verdi
